text: 4.25: Ais 53.4-5; 1 Ko 15.17; 2 Ko 5.21; Ga 1.4; 1 Pi 1.21Fhe Bakɨme fhura mba gumgi garim, mbe Zisas shogim, ana rimgi. Ana rimgip, nza muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi, ana nta vhɨzgirga. Ana rimgim, Fhe Bakɨme wom ana khavgi. Ana ana khavgip, nza suaŋv tuava muuŋgip, Fhe Bakɨme tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui gumgi gu mbigir nzan kamɨnga.
